This live wallpaper creates a warm and inviting atmosphere with its intricate details: glowing lanterns, soft cushions, a beautifully arranged tea set, and a large window offering a picturesque view of a peaceful anime-style garden. Perfect for anime lovers, this design transforms your new tab into a calm haven amidst the bustling online world.
